comment.author: 68512117@N02
comment._content: Two 10AF 7BG B-24s bringing desperately needed gasoline to the 14AF base at Suichwan from India arrived during a Japanese air raid.  A P-61 Black Widow night fighter from the 427NFS sent up to intercept the Japanese bombers shot down B-24 44-41438 with a crew of 9.  Two crewmen survived: 1st Lt. Billy Ingram (navigator) and S/Sgt. Julian Zdep (assistant engineer/gunner).
